select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from sys_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (user_id, username, password, phone, update_time, status, account, salt, good_business, service_count, success_case_id, city_id, create_time, video_introduction, area ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{successCaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{videoIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
